title: Are you listening?
brief_description: Observes the operation of the Development Music Programme, adapted by Deanna Hoermann form the Kodaly method, in New South Wales, where children are being trained to be musically literate. Results show improvements in mathematics, reading, memory, concentration and other learning skills.Classroom activities in kindergarten and primary grades show the techniques and concepts used. Suitable for Upper Secondary and Tertiary students.
